channel.title: Music – Ben E.King
channel.description: Recent content in Ben E.King on Music

item.title: Ben E.King - STAND BY ME
item.description:
작곡: Ben E.King & E.Glick / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 1086 / KY: 7141

When the night
has come
And the land is dark
and the moon–
Is the only
light we see
No I won’t
be afraid
No I— won’t
be afraid
Just as long–
as you stand-
Stand by- me
so darling darling
Stand by me
oh- stand– by me
Oh stand stand by- me
stand by- me
If the sky
that we look upon
Should tumble
and fall
And the mountains
should crumble
To the sea
I won’t cry
I won’t cry
no I- won’t—-
Share a tear
just as long
As you stand
stand by- me
And darling darling
stand by me
Oh- stand– by me
oh stand
Stand by- me
stand by- me-

Darling darling
stand by me
Oh- stand– by me
oh stand
Stand by- me
stand by- me
Whenever your
in trouble won’t you
Stand by me
oh- stand– by me
Oh stand stand by- me
stand by- me-

item.title: Ben E.King - Don't Play That Song
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Betty Nelson, Ahmet Ertegun
KY: 60356 / KY: 7226

Don’t play it no more
don’t play it no more
Don’t play it no more
no no no no no no no
Don’t play
that song for me
It brings
back memories
Of days that
I once knew
The days that
I spent with you
Oh no don’t
let it play
It fills my heart
with pain
Please stop it
right away
I remember just
a what it said it said
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
You lied you lied
lied lied lied
Remember on our
first date
You kissed me
and you walked away
You were only
seventeen
I never thought
you’d act
So mean
but baby
You told me
you loved me
You told me
you care
You said
I’ll go
With your darling
almost anywhere
But darling
you know that
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
You lied you lied
lied lied lied
Don’t play it no more
don’t play it no more
Stop the baby
no no no no no no
Don’t play
it no more
Baby please
don’t play baby
Don’t play
it no more
No no no no no
stop the baby
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
(Darling I love you)
you know that you lied
